member.name: T:Nalam360.Platform.FeatureFlags.Strategies.ABTestStrategy
member.summary: A/B testing strategy - assigns users to experiment variants based on configured percentages. Uses consistent hashing to ensure same user always gets same variant.

member.summary: Gets the variant assigned to the user.

member.name: T:Nalam360.Platform.FeatureFlags.Strategies.PercentageRolloutStrategy
member.summary: Percentage rollout strategy - enables feature for a specified percentage of users. Uses consistent hashing to ensure same user always gets same result.

member.name: T:Nalam360.Platform.FeatureFlags.Strategies.TimeWindowStrategy
member.summary: Time window strategy - enables feature only during specified time periods. Useful for scheduled feature releases, maintenance windows, or promotional periods.

member.name: T:Nalam360.Platform.FeatureFlags.Strategies.UserTargetingStrategy
member.summary: User targeting strategy - enables feature for specific users or user segments.
